column1: #Text=A whirlwind of dust , scorching down the road , suddenly broke into violent diffuse masses ; and Demetrio 's army emerged , a chaos of horses , broad chests , tangled manes , dilated nostrils , oval , wide eyes , hoofs flying in the air , legs stiffened from endless galloping ; and of men with bronze faces , ivory teeth , and flashing eyes , their rifles in their hands or slung across the saddles .
#Text=Demetrio and Camilla brought up the rear .
#Text=She was still nervous , white-lipped and parched ; he was angry at their futile maneuver .
#Text=For there had been battles , no followers of Orozco 's to be seen .

#Text=A handful of Federals , routed . A poor devil of a priest left dangling from a mesquite ; a few dead , scattered over the field , who had once been united under the archaic slogan , RIGHTS AND RELIGION , with , on their breasts , the red cloth insignia : Halt !
#Text=The Sacred Heart of Jesus is with me !

#Text= I just want a place to sleep for my woman and me , " Demetrio said reassuringly .

column1: #Text=As he explained that he was the chief of a small army which was to camp nearby that night , the man smoking , who owned the place , bid them enter with great deference .
#Text=He ran to fetch a broom and a pail of water to dust and wash the best corner of the hut as decent lodging for his distinguished guests .
#Text=" Here , ' Pifanio , go out there and unsaddle the horses .
